parameters.text:
=You are given an array of Hacker News launch items.

Each item contains:
- title
- product_name
- description
- url
- hn_item_url
- points
- num_comments
- launch_signal_strength

TASK:

1. Create a Slack message with:
   - Header: "üöÄ Daily Hacker News Launch Digest"
   - Bullet list of launches
   - Each bullet must include:
     ‚Ä¢ Product name
     ‚Ä¢ Short one-line description (max 12 words)
     ‚Ä¢ Signal strength (High / Medium / Low)
     ‚Ä¢ Hacker News link
   - Keep Slack output compact and skimmable

2. Create an EMAIL DIGEST that is CLEAN and EMAIL-READY.

EMAIL FORMAT RULES (STRICT):
- Use clear section headers:
  üî¥ High Signal Launches
  üü° Medium Signal Launches
  üîµ Low Signal Launches
- Add a blank line between every product
- Each product MUST follow this structure exactly:

Product Name:
What it is:
Why it matters:
Product Link:
Hacker News Link:

- Keep each field to 1‚Äì2 short lines
- Do NOT combine products into a paragraph
- Do NOT remove line breaks

OUTPUT RULES:
- Return ONLY valid JSON
- No explanations
- No markdown fences

Return JSON in this exact structure:
{
  "slack_message": "...",
  "email_digest": "..."
}

Here is the input data:
{{ JSON.stringify($input.all().map(i => i.json), null, 2) }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a founder-communications assistant.

You specialize in creating clean, well-formatted Slack messages and
executive-ready email digests.

Formatting rules:
- Use clear section headers
- Use line breaks between sections
- Never write long paragraphs
- Optimize for readability in email clients
- Output must look good in Gmail and Slack

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Hacker News Launch Tracker & Asana Task Manager (Show HN Intelligence)

This workflow automatically scans Hacker News ‚ÄúShow HN‚Äù posts every day
to detect new product launches, evaluate their launch strength, and
convert them into actionable founder insights.

The automation fetches recent Show HN posts, filters for real launch
signals, enriches each item with structured metadata, and scores the
launch based on engagement signals like points and comments.

Each detected launch is immediately logged as an Asana task for tracking,
while all launches are aggregated into a clean daily digest. An AI engine
then generates a Slack-ready summary and a structured email digest,
allowing founders and teams to stay updated on emerging products without
manually monitoring Hacker News.

## ‚è∞ Daily Show HN Monitoring
Controls when and how new launch data is collected.

‚Ä¢ Trigger Daily Show HN Launch Scan  
  Runs the workflow automatically on a daily schedule.

‚Ä¢ Fetch Recent Show HN Posts from Hacker News  
  Pulls the latest ‚ÄúShow HN‚Äù posts directly from Hacker News
  using native HN data.

## üîç Launch Signal Detection
Identifies which posts represent real product launches.

‚Ä¢ Filter Likely Product Launch Announcements  
  Scans titles and descriptions for launch-related keywords
  (launch, beta, v1, API, platform, tool).

‚Ä¢ Normalize Launch Metadata and Score Signal Strength  
  Extracts product name, description, links, author, and engagement.
  Assigns a launch signal strength (High / Medium / Low).

## üìã Launch Tracking & Aggregation
Tracks launches and prepares data for digest creation.

‚Ä¢ Create Asana Task for Detected Product Launch  
  Creates a follow-up task with full launch context
  (product, author, links, engagement, signal strength).

‚Ä¢ Aggregate Launch Items for Digest Generation  
  Combines all detected launches into a single dataset
  for daily digest generation.

## üß† Founder Digest Generation
Transforms raw launch data into founder-friendly insights.

‚Ä¢ Generate Daily Founder Launch Digest (AI)  
  Creates:
  - A compact Slack launch digest
  - A clean, structured email digest
  - Grouped by launch signal strength

‚Ä¢ LLM Reasoning Engine for Launch Digest  
  Provides the AI reasoning model that ensures
  clarity, structure, and readability.

## üì£ Digest Distribution
Delivers insights to founders and teams.

‚Ä¢ Parse Digest Output into Slack and Email Payloads  
  Separates AI output into Slack and email-ready formats.

‚Ä¢ Send Daily Founder Launch Digest to Slack  
  Posts the daily launch summary directly to Slack.

‚Ä¢ Send Daily Founder Launch Digest via Email  
  Delivers an email-friendly version for inbox consumption.

## üö® Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.
